title: No, Advani hasn’t made any statements asking Modi to build at least a water kiosk on his name
subtitle: Advani did not ask Modi to build at least a water kiosk on his name. False statements are being attributed to him.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image with a photo of BJP leader LK Advani and an accompanying message is being shared widely on Facebook. The message is in Hindi and its English translation is- ‘Modiji, I(Advani) have worked hard to build BJP, you should at least built a water kiosk on my name’. Let’s try to analyze the claim.



Till the time of writing this article, the post has been shared more than 9,800 times and also, many users are reacting to those statements purportedly made by Advani.

Claim: Lal Krishna Advani: “Modiji, I have worked hard to build BJP, you should at least build a water kiosk on my name”. Fact: LK Advani hasn’t made these comments. Information from no credible source was found which confirms that the comments were made by him. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When searched on Google with keywords ‘Advani asked Modi to build a water kiosk on his name’, no relevant information was obtained in the search results about Advani making those statements.



If Advani had really made such statements, they would have been reported by all the major newspapers and channels in India. But no news agency has reported anything about Advani making those comments. So, false statements are being attributed to Advani.

To conclude, Advani hasn’t made any such statements asking Modi to build at least a water kiosk on his name. False statements are being attributed to him.
